"How it Works-Using your GoDine™ Mobile App is easy and fun! Simply search for GoDine™ Restaurants wherever you are using the location services. Then filter by Cuisine, Price, Features, etc.You can also use the Map option for Turn-by-Turn directions to your restaurant location.
Once you arrive-Enjoy your meal(s) with friends and family. When it’s time to pay your check, let your server know that you are a GoDine™ Member. He/she will ask you to:
     • Open the GoDine™ App
     • Pull Up Validation Page – bottom menu (center button)
    • Server Validates Membership - He/she will validate your membership by tapping the screen
     • Server brings bill to the table
     • You add Total Check Savings – amounts in the boxes on the membership validation screen
    • You press “Complete Validation Process” button
    • 10 Second Review -You complete the 5 Second Review
    • Oh yeah, don’t forget to pay the check!
    • Tip your Sever generously - Make sure to tip your server on the total amount before the discount is applied. They work just as hard for you even when you get such a great deal."
Please click Find a Sponsor to select your sponsor member
Refer as many friends as you can because for every friend that joins GoDine™ using your member number, you\'ll get one FREE month of membership.
It\'s rare to see a member cancelling a membership with GoDine™ so we\'re sorry to lose you as a member.Please tap here to continue the process.

This sends an email to GoDine requesting to change your registration photo.GoDine will send you an email with instructions to provide your User Name, Password, Member #,and new photo for approval and change.
To Find sponsor enter member or cell number.

The Member Validation Photo is required to validate membership in the restaurant.\nThis photo must be a recent and easily recognizable front view photo of the member only and cannot be a group photo, couple, etc. Just as would be used for an ID card or Driver\'s License
